column2: #Remove taxa not associated with any samples anymore
otu_table()   OTU Table:         [ 263 taxa and 242 samples ]
sample_data() Sample Data:       [ 242 samples by 79 sample variables ]
tax_table()   Taxonomy Table:    [ 263 taxa by 7 taxonomic ranks ]
phy_tree()    Phylogenetic Tree: [ 263 tips and 261 internal nodes ]
TotalReads = sample_sums(ps1.v1)) ##Total reads is sequence depth

#dt.ps1.v1.sample_data <- dt.ps1.v1.sample_data[, -1] #Drop the first column as is a duplicate of sample ID
gg.SeqDepth = ggplot(dt.ps1.v1.sample_data, aes(TotalReads)) + geom_histogram() + ggtitle("Sequencing Depth")
